::Battera::

She followed him. "I'd be happy to join you on a mission for 
Zardus."  She walked with him down the hall. "You know, It's good to 
see you again.  I ave to admit. I was getting worried about you."
She smiled and looked at him. She really did miss him. She was happy 
to know that he was OK and that they were together again. 


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "David Torrey" <Dachande85@m...> wrote:
> ::CyberShark::
> 
>     He was amazed that Battera thought she belonged here. He just 
couldn't believe it.
>     "I am going to get a task from Zardus," He said, putting on the 
proverbial mask. He was acting, now for Battera too, he had no 
friends here, he needed to get her out, to help her. "I would love 
for you to join me."
>     He turned and started walking, slowly, so Battera could catch 
up if she wished.
>   ----- Original Message ----- 
>   From: logomorph@h... 
>   To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
>   Sent: Saturday, October 07, 2000 7:16 PM
>   Subject: NBW
> 
> 
>   ::Feline::
>   She watched and learned as Zardus installed the new board into 
the 
>   femmebot strapped to the lab table. She payed close attention and 
>   took lots of mental notes.
> 
> 
>   ::Battera::
>   She still had the look of shock on her face as she stood at 
>   CyberShark.
